status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Across the 6‑hour window, the turbine is consistently in **Downtime** for all **35** ten‑minute intervals, with **near‑zero power** (mean −0.0018, std 0.001) despite generally low wind (mean 2.77 m/s, std 0.88) and one brief higher wind event (max 12.4 m/s). Rotor speed shows **no variability** (rotor_rpm_std 0.0) while generator speed has limited variation (std 3.91), alongside a **high average pitch** (85.29) and **elevated yaw misalignment** (mean 65.51; tagged), and the **power residual** is positive on average (0.0243). Temperatures are steady/moderate (mean 34.3).
